sen.j: 六勝寺（ろくしょうじ、りくしょうじ）とは、平安時代後期の院政期に天皇、皇后が洛外白河 (京都市)（現在の京都市左京区岡崎・平安神宮の周辺）に建てた6つの仏教寺院である。
sen.e: Rokusho-ji (or Rikusho-ji) temples are six Buddhist temples that were constructed in Shirakawa in the outer part of Kyoto (Kyoto City) (the area around Heian-jingu Shrine in Okazaki, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City) by successive emperors and an empress during the period of cloistered rule of the late Heian period.
